## high fashion for petites

Petite clothing for women. Petite studio is your go to petite shop for petite
fashion. Founded in 2016.

"Special high-quality, and truly thoughtful pieces" - CNN

## Customer Testimonials

### I love Petite Studio. Finally...clothes made for me! Every piece in my
closet gets tons of wear -- and compliments!

LESLIE S. 5'3" | NEW YORK CITY

### I just wanted to say how much I loved everything! I've never had something
fit so perfect on me. I am only 5'0" tall and it is so difficult to find
things that are stylish and high fashion.

SANDY S. 5'0" | NEW YORK CITY

### I've been head over heels over Petite Studio ever since I discovered it.
All the pieces are so versatile and tailored so well for us petite girls. I've
loved every single piece I've gotten... now I can't get enough!

CHARLENE Z. 5'4" | VANCOUVER
